section1.slide3_sub: We provide awesome and delicious food

section2.desc1: Whatever your occasion, We makes it one to remember!
section2.desc2: One of the best restaurants in the UAE offering healthy food. We believed that healthy or diet food with great taste was possible and each day that is what we deliver to our customers. Low Calories Restaurant offers fresh nutritious food, with new ideas, new flavors and sauces.
section2.desc3: OUR GOAL: To let everyone enjoy our healthy delicious meals and gain all the benefits and reap all the rewards that go with it

section3.desc: We serve a daily changing menu. We serve our best food.

meal1.title: Caesar Salad
meal1.desc: Salmon fillet in a rich red curry with coconut milk, sweet basil leaves ,pea aubergine, and kaffir lime leaves

meal2.title: Dynamite shrimps
meal2.desc: Thai rice noodles stir-fried with bean curd, chinese chives, peanuts and beans sprouts in a special homemade sauce

meal3.title: Shrimp Magbous
meal3.desc: Grill boneless corn-fed chicken, marinated in coconut milk, lemongrass, galangal, turmeric and lime leaves

meal4.title: Beef Lasagna
meal4.desc: The famous hot, sour and spicy thai soup with king prawn, shimeji mushrooms, lemongrass, and lime leaf

overview1.title: PREPARED FRESH
overview1.desc: Our meals are prepared and delivered fresh daily. We use special bags to preserve the delicious taste and quality of the food.

overview2.title: LOW CALORIES
overview2.desc: We deliver our meal plans daily, all you have to do is to keep them in the fridge and heat when you are ready for a delicious healthy meal.

overview3.title: DAILY DELIVERY
overview3.desc: Our delivery time is from 10AM-10PM daily except Fridays.

section5.desc1: Low Calories is a leading healthy food restaurants chain with over 35 branches.
section5.desc2: Our goal is to make healthy eating accessible for everyone.

suggestions.title: Suggestions
suggestions.desc: We appreciate all your suggestions, ideas and feedback

footer.desc: We each have different schedules and life pressures that might affect our nutritional choices. So, living a healthy and balanced lifestyle can be both challenging and time consuming. If you want to commit to a healthier lifestyle, you don't have to devote two hours a day to cooking, and spend all your time figuring out what is healthy and what is not. Instead, simply subscribe to our monthly meal packages and live the healthy lifestyle you deserve...

section1.title: Newsletter
section1.desc: Subscribe to our newsletter keeps you up-to-date!
